name: @potetotown/vitrio
description: Ultra-minimal reactive UI framework with derive() API

scripts.build: bun run embed:wasm && bun build ./src/index.ts ./src/jsx-runtime.ts ./src/jsx-dev-runtime.ts --outdir ./dist --target browser --minify
scripts.build:wasm: v -prod -gc none -b wasm -d no_backtrace -d no_stdio -o dist/vsignal.wasm src/vsignal/signal.v && bun run embed:wasm
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run build:wasm && bun run build && bun run build:types
scripts.prepare: bun run build:wasm && bun run build && bun run build:types
